scripts.precommit: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "format,lint,build" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run format:write" "npm run lint" "npm run build"
scripts.e2e:dev: npm run delete_reports ; cross-var nx run ui-e2e:e2e-dev --env.SUITE=%SUITE% --env.appEnv=dev
scripts.e2e:qa: npm run delete_reports ; cross-var nx run ui-e2e:e2e-qa --env.SUITE=%SUITE% --env.appEnv=qa
scripts.e2e:ppd: npm run delete_reports ; cross-var nx run ui-e2e:e2e-ppd --env.SUITE=%SUITE% --env.appEnv=ppd
scripts.e2e:admin-dev: npm run delete_reports ; cross-var nx run ui-e2e:e2e-admin-dev --env.SUITE=%SUITE% --env.appEnv=admin-dev
scripts.e2e:admin-qa: npm run delete_reports ; cross-var nx run ui-e2e:e2e-admin-qa --env.SUITE=%SUITE% --env.appEnv=admin-qa
scripts.e2e:admin-ppd: npm run delete_reports ; cross-var nx run ui-e2e:e2e-admin-ppd --env.SUITE=%SUITE% --env.appEnv=admin-ppd
scripts.e2e:run:watch: wait-on http://localhost:3333/health && cross-var nx run ui-e2e:e2e --env.SUITE=%SUITE% --watch
scripts.e2e:dev:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=dev --config-file cypress.client.js
scripts.e2e:qa:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=qa --config-file cypress.client.js
scripts.e2e:ppd:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=ppd --config-file cypress.client.js
scripts.e2e:prod:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=prod --config-file cypress.client.js
scripts.e2e:fed-dev:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=fed-dev --config-file cypress.client.js
scripts.e2e:fed-qa:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=fed-qa --config-file cypress.client.js
scripts.e2e:fed-ppd:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=fed-ppd --config-file cypress.client.js
scripts.e2e:admin-dev:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=admin-dev --config-file cypress.admin.js
scripts.e2e:admin-qa:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=admin-qa --config-file cypress.admin.js
scripts.e2e:admin-ppd:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=admin-ppd --config-file cypress.admin.js
scripts.e2e:admin-prod:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=admin-prod --config-file cypress.admin.js
scripts.e2e:admin-fed-dev:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=fed-admin-dev --config-file cypress.admin.js
scripts.e2e:admin-fed-qa:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=fed-admin-qa --config-file cypress.admin.js
scripts.e2e:admin-fed-ppd:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=fed-admin-ppd --config-file cypress.admin.js

scripts.e2e:caqa:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=caqa --config-file cypress.lockers.js -- --spec 'ui-e2e/src/integration/02_lockers/**/*.spec.ts'
scripts.e2e:cappd:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=cappd --config-file cypress.lockers.js -- --spec 'ui-e2e/src/integration/02_lockers/**/*.spec.ts'
scripts.e2e:fedqa:watch: cross-var npx cypress open --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=fedqa --config-file cypress.lockers.js -- --spec 'ui-e2e/src/integration/02_lockers/**/*.spec.ts'
scripts.e2e:admin_tool:ci:dev: npm run delete_reports ; cross-var npx cypress run --project ./ui-e2e --env SUITE=%SUITE%,appEnv=admin-dev --record --key 0d4fb6f0-bfdf-4699-ac98-69b5303e752b --tag=${SUITE-@regression}-admin-dev --config-file cypress.admin.js --group '[DEV] Admin' --spec 'ui-e2e/src/integration/04_adminPortal/**/*.spec.ts' --parallel
